name: OSNumber
desc: A container for an integer value.

items.name: + withNumber
items.desc: Allocates an OSNumber object with value and size.

items.name: + withNumber
items.desc: Allocates an OSNumber object with value from a c-string and size.

items.name: - unsigned8BitValue
items.desc: Returns the value of the OSNumber as a uint8_t value.

items.name: - unsigned16BitValue
items.desc: Returns the value of the OSNumber as a uint16_t value.

items.name: - unsigned32BitValue
items.desc: Returns the value of the OSNumber as a uint32_t value.

items.name: - unsigned64BitValue
items.desc: Returns the value of the OSNumber as a uint64_t value.

items.name: - numberOfBits
items.desc: Returns the number of bits the OSNumber was created with.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the number with an OSNumber.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the string with an OSObject
